description: Move you camera until white dots will display in your screen. Touch at any white dots to start your learning!
Calling all science detectives! Today we'll be putting on our detective hats to crack
the case of the microorganisms!  Are they beneficial buddies or harmful villains? Let's analyze some clues!
I'll show you a series of images featuring various microorganisms. analyze each image and decide whether
it represents a microorganism that is: Harmful: Can cause diseases or damage living tissues.
Beneficial: Play a positive role in our lives, like aiding digestion or food production.
That's good to hear! Let's start!
A close-up of mold growing on bread?
A picture of bacteria in a yogurt culture?
A micrograph of a virus infecting a cell?
